item.title: Can Europe’s New Military Spending Help Its Economies?
item.description: The continent’s leaders hope a surge of investment, to fill a security void left by the United States, can ignite growth. It won’t be easy.

item.title: Trump Has Hinted at a Xi Visit. China Is Still Wondering What He Wants.
item.description: Chinese experts say Beijing is open to talks but is being stonewalled by the State Department and other official channels.

item.title: Turkey Arrests Istanbul Mayor, Key Rival to President Erdogan
